title: Brush stroke font
content:
I need a font like the "black swan" one, I also like the other one.

I know these were custom made, but maybe someone can help me find something in the same style?  
I need something like this for a logo and I'll try to adapt it a little to make it more unique.

Thanks for the help !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/092011-055656PM_078_3838.BSWAN_.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ec9071e4b0d8a72a94dc721986da0c28_6404.jpg)

author: AnaBanana

comments.content: Some I like: Robert Arnow's [Mustang](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/mustang/) and [Streetbrush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/robarnow/streetbrush/), [Ragged Brad](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.php), [Flood](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/flood/), [Wolf's rain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.dafont.com/wolfsrain.font), [Xtreme Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/artandsignstudio.com/xtremescript.html), [Asylum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/asylum.php), [Blaze](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blaze/), [Fresh Paint](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/highground/fresh-paint/), [Scraper](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/highground/scraper/), [Hunglan Design fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.hunglandesign.com/?page_id=7), [Lassigue D'mato](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/lassigue-dmato/), [Gizmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/gtype/gizmo/), [Fashionista](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bluevinyl/fashionista-bv/), [Brushtip C](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/brushtip-c/)
